original_text: Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 너는 피를 먹지 말라 네가 이같이 여호와께서 의롭게 여기시는 일을 행하면 너와 네 후손이 복을 누리리라

sentences.original_text: that it may go well with thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네게 잘 되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and with thy children after thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 또 네 뒤를 잇는 네 자녀에게도

sentences.original_text: when thou shalt do that which is right
in the sight of the Lord.
